name: Removing spaces only at the beginning of a line
instruction:
Write a function `clearString` that takes a string and returns it without spaces only at the beginning of the string.

An example of running the function:
```javascript
clearString(' abc'); // 'abc'
clearString('abc '); // 'abc '
clearString(' abc '); // 'abc '
clearString(' a b c '); // 'a b c '
clearString(' a b c '); // 'a b c '
clearString(' a b c'); // 'a b c'
```
